name: Core
description: The core API server & authentication system for Colorgy.

APP_NAME.description: The displayed name of this application.

APP_URL.description: Set this to the full URL (including 'https://') of your application.

SITE_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed SSO cookies. Should be same across all sites using this SSO service.

SECRET_KEY_BASE.description: A base secret key for general use.

PEPPER.description: A secret key to encrypt passwords.

LOGGER.description: Which logger to use, can be 'default', 'stdout' or 'remote'.

MAILER_DELIVERY_METHOD.description: Which Mailing Service to use, can be 'letter_opener' or 'mailgun'.

SMS_DELIVERY_METHOD.description: Which SMS Service to use, can be 'test' or 'nexmo'.

URL_TLD.description: Set this to false to disable top-level domain (TLD) features, e.g. cross-domain cookies (should be 'false' when deployed to heroku).

STAGING.description: Information of staging server (should not be blank if deployed to a staging server).
